deleteMarkerReplication.description: Whether delete markers are replicated. This argument is only valid with V2 replication configurations (i.e., when `filter` is used)documented below.

destination.description: Specifies the destination for the rule. See below.

existingObjectReplication.description: Replicate existing objects in the source bucket according to the rule configurations. See below.

filter.description: Filter that identifies subset of objects to which the replication rule applies. See below. If not specified, the `rule` will default to using `prefix`.

id.description: Unique identifier for the rule. Must be less than or equal to 255 characters in length.

prefix.description: Object key name prefix identifying one or more objects to which the rule applies. Must be less than or equal to 1024 characters in length. Defaults to an empty string (`""`) if `filter` is not specified.

priority.description: Priority associated with the rule. Priority should only be set if `filter` is configured. If not provided, defaults to `0`. Priority must be unique between multiple rules.

sourceSelectionCriteria.description: Specifies special object selection criteria. See below.

status.description: Status of the rule. Either `"Enabled"` or `"Disabled"`. The rule is ignored if status is not "Enabled".
